mapper.update:
update SC_FAQ
FAQ_TITLE = #{faqTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQ_TYPE_ID = #{faqTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR},
PARENT_FAQ_ID = #{parentFaqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOT_QUESTION = #{hotQuestion,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORDER_ = #{order,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
BELONG = #{belong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQ_TYPE = #{faqType,jdbcType=CHAR},
FAQ_CONTENT = #{faqContent,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SC_FAQ set FAQ_TITLE = #{faqTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQ_TYPE_ID = #{faqTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARENT_FAQ_ID = #{parentFaqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOT_QUESTION = #{hotQuestion,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_ = #{order,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, BELONG = #{belong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQ_TYPE = #{faqType,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAQ_CONTENT = #{faqContent,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SC_FAQ set FAQ_TITLE = #{faqTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQ_TYPE_ID = #{faqTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARENT_FAQ_ID = #{parentFaqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOT_QUESTION = #{hotQuestion,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_ = #{order,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, BELONG = #{belong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQ_TYPE = #{faqType,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: ID, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_TYPE_ID, CATEGORY, PARENT_FAQ_ID, HOT_QUESTION, ORDER_, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, FLAG, BELONG, FAQ_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
,
from SC_FAQ where flag=1
and FAQ_TYPE_ID=#{map.kindid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and FAQ_CONTENT like '%${map.keyvalue}%'
order by ORDER_ desc
